greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3*a(n-2) for n > 2; a(1) = 4, a(2) = 3.
comment: Binomial transform is A162559. Second binomial transform is A077236.
formula: a(n) = A074324(n+1) = A166552(n+1) = 3^floor(n/2)*4^(n%2), where n%2 = 0 for n even, 1 for n odd. - _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 03 2014
program: (MAGMA) [ n le 2 select 5-n else 3*Self(n-2): n in [1..34] ];
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jul 13 2009
